item.description:
Dear Friends,

Our JOYful Sunday Service gatherings include Chanting, Meditation, Purification Ritual, readings from the Bible and Bhagavad Gita, short talk, healing prayers, and Festival of Light. followed by a vegetarian potluck lunch.

Please join us in our feast of joy...meet new friends - re-connect with old friends in a spirit filled atmosphere.

Hope you can make it!

Joy,
Jiavanna
item.how_to_find_us: As you arrive at Angels on Horseback/Ramrod Farms drive to the first building on the left and park. The one with the White Star on it
item.name: JOY is within you!
